Token.Abstract: @abstract Called when the view controller will log the user out in response to a button press.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The view controller sending the message.

Token.Abstract: @abstract Called after the view controller logged the user out in response to a button press.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The view controller sending the message.

Token.Abstract: @abstract Called when the view controller will log the user in in response to a button press. Note that logging in can fail for a number of reasons, so there is no guarantee that this will be followed by a call to loginViewControllerDidLogUserIn:. Callers wanting more granular notification of the session state changes can use KVO or the NSNotificationCenter to observe them.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The view controller sending the message.

Token.Abstract: @abstract Called after the view controller successfully logged the user in in response to a button press.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The view controller sending the message.

Token.Abstract: @abstract Called if the view controller encounters an error while trying to log a user in.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: The view controller sending the message.
